pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### Example use:```pythonfrom mentord import *User_client: Client = Client()User_client.connect(token='YOUR TOKEN')```### Use decorators:```python@on_ready(client=User_client, delay=5.0)def client_on_ready() -> None: print('Self-bot is started!')@on_message(client=User_client, delay=0.5)def client_on_message(message: Message) -> None: utils.channel_opers.ChannelOperations(channel=message.channel_id, client=User_client).send_message("hello!")```
